description: Single-storey side extension (following the demolition of existing rear extension); Removal of side elevation window and chimneys at rear outrigger; Formation of vehicle crossover
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 100 A EXISTING LOCATION PLAN; 101 B EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN; 101a C EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN; 102 A EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN; 103 A EXISTING LOFT PLAN; 104 A EXISTING ROOF PLAN; 200 A EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION; 201 B EXISTING REAR ELEVATION; 202 A EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION; 260 A EXISTING SECTION AA; 121 D PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN; 121a D PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN Dropped Kerb; 122 D PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN; 123 B PROPOSED LOFT PLAN; 124 B PROPOSED ROOF PLAN; 220 A PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION; 221 C PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION; 222 C PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION; 270 B PROPOSED SECTION AA
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
| The proposed dropped kerb shall have a width of 2.4m, visibility splays of 1.5m by 1.5m, and free of obstructions higher than 0.6m within the visibility splays.
Reason: In the interests of highway safety, in line with Policy T5 of the London Plan (2021).
